revtext: I\'m so glad . I bought this topper from wigomania . Great quality and price. Surprisingly enough it had the exact length as my own hair. I thank ayesha who helped me out of a difficult situation. I really appreciate your kindness and support. Preethi thank u so much for selecting the product.
revreply: Thank you so much for your kind words and appreciation. We try our best to offer best service and value to all our clients
